strong.span:
THE ALDEN CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT
THANKS OUR LOCAL HEALTHCARE WORKERS
AND FIRST RESPONDERS

THANK YOU FOR ALL YOU DO
ON THE FRONTLINE TO KEEP OUR
COMMUNITY SAFE AND HEALTHY!

p.span: EXECUTIVE ORDER, SCHOOL WILL BE CLOSED
LEARN MORE ABOUT HOW WE ARE
BY CLICKING ON THE COVID-19 TAB

span.strong: FOOD DELIVERIES/PICKUP WILL CONTINUE WHILE SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED

br.br: You only need to sign up ONCE to receive food delivieries.

li.span: Email to Anita Trautwein ATrautwein@aldenschools.org OR

p.span: CUTOFF DAY/TIME for first time sign up

li.span: Saturday midnight deadline for first delivery Monday (pick up only after the deadline)
Wednesday 6:00 PM for first delivery Thursday (pick up only after the deadline)
